name: % Approve of wife working if husband can support (OWID (2017))
description: Of those polled, what percent approve of a wife working if her husband can support her?
datasetName: US Opinion on wives working 1936-1998 - OWID compilation

source.name: OWID based on Fogli and Veldkamp (2011) and GSS
source.dataPublishedBy: For 1936-1970 we use Fogli and Veldkamp (2011); For 1972-1998 we use GSS data
source.dataPublisherSource: Fogli and Veldkamp (2011) use IPOLL data
source.additionalInfo: The question asked in the Fogli and Veldkamp data varies slightly, see their appendix (B.2 Survey data) for more detail. GSS survey respondents answered the question "Do you approve or disapprove of a married woman earning money in business or industry if she has a husband capable of supporting her?"
